name: Nabfly, Inc.
description: Provider of subscription-based collection of lifestyle products intended to offer uniquely standalone goods for men. The company's products include a collection of lifestyle products that are limited edition products packaged together in a box driven by a specific story or theme in the areas of style, grooming, food, drink, and gear, enabling men to have a club membership and personalized mix of products based on their interests.
